sentences.sContent: His leg was crushed in the accident.
sentences.sCn: 他的腿在事故中被压断。

sentences.sContent: Two people were crushed to death in the rush to escape.
sentences.sCn: 两个人在逃生过程中被踩死。

synos.tran: 粉碎；迷恋；压榨；拥挤的人群

phrases.pCn: 抗压，抗压溃性能；粉碎抵抗；抗破碎性

words.tran: 压倒的；决定性的；不能站起来；支离破碎的
打击；[食品] 压碎机；压碎的东西；镇服人的事实
压破，征服，冲入（crush的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tranOther: to press something so hard that it breaks or is damaged

trans.tranCn: 粉碎；迷恋；压榨；拥挤的人群
trans.tranOther: a crowd of people pressed so close together that it is difficult for them to move
